name: Martian Space Blaster
description:
Martian Space Blaster is a asteroids like top-down shooter where you fight squid monsters in space that was made during the Miziziziz game jam. That's it. There is not much to it. This was my first game jam and while I wished I could have done more, i'm proud of my game.

The art assets in the game are from the Kenney 1-bit art pack:

https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
